title: Frameworks API
description: A curated list of JavaScript frameworks for building APIs on the backend.

items.title: Express.js
items.description: Express.js is a fast, unopinionated, and minimalist web framework for Node.js.

items.title: Koa
items.description: Koa is a lightweight and expressive middleware framework for Node.js.

items.title: Fastify
items.description: Fastify is a web framework highly focused on providing the best developer experience with the least overhead.

items.title: NestJS
items.description: NestJS is a progressive Node.js framework for building efficient, reliable, and scalable server-side applications.

items.title: Hapi.js
items.description: Hapi.js is a rich framework for building applications and services.

items.title: LoopBack
items.description: LoopBack is a highly extensible Node.js framework for building APIs and connecting them with backend data sources.

items.title: AdonisJS
items.description: AdonisJS is a Node.js web framework with a focus on developer ergonomics and speed.

items.title: Sails.js
items.description: Sails.js is a real-time MVC framework for Node.js that simplifies the process of building custom, enterprise-grade Node.js applications.

items.title: Feathers
items.description: Feathers is a lightweight web framework for building real-time applications.

items.title: Strapi
items.description: Strapi is an open-source headless CMS that offers a customizable API generation feature.

items.title: Nodal
items.description: Nodal is a full-featured framework for building APIs and web servers in Node.js.

items.title: LoopBack 4
items.description: LoopBack 4 is a highly extensible Node.js framework for building APIs and connecting them with backend data sources.

items.title: Micro
items.description: Micro is a minimalistic microservices framework for Node.js.

items.title: Restify
items.description: Restify is a Node.js web service framework optimized for building RESTful APIs.

items.title: Naja
items.description: Naja is a modern, fast, and minimalist web framework for Node.js.
